abstract: Dow Jones industrial average drops 40.72 points, or 0.35 percent, to 11,478.13; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index falls 3.59 points, or 0.3 percent, to 1,203.66; Nasdaq composite index gains 15.5 points, or 0.6 percent, to 2,620.
snippet: The mood was dampened after JPMorgan Chase reported weaker quarterly earnings and Chinese trade figures stoked concerns over the economic outlook.
lead_paragraph: The mood was dampened after JPMorgan Chase reported weaker quarterly earnings and Chinese trade figures stoked concerns over the economic outlook.

headline.main: Following Banks, Shares Close Down on Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Following Banks, Shares Close Down on Wall Street
headline.seo: Shares Close Down on Wall Street
